summary.para: Determines the type of the stock take transaction (i.e. Standard,All Location and Overdue)
Standard - The default option when doing this transaction.
All Location - All locations and items within the warehouse are automatically included as part of the transaction.
Overdue - All items that are overdue(i.e DateCreation of the item + StockTakeDays) will be included in stock counting.
